titles.title: To provide for the reliquidation of certain entries of high-density, fiberboard-core laminate wall and floor panels, and for other purposes.
To provide for the reliquidation of certain entries of high-density, fiberboard-core laminate wall and floor panels, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade .

bill.summary: Directs U.S. Customs and Border Protection to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of high-density, fiberboard-core laminate wall and floor panels.
